text: Judgment at Nuremberg is a 1961 American drama movie directed by Stanley Kramer. The movie was about crimes being wrongly committed by citizens during the Nuremberg Trials by the Nazis. The was set during World War II. It stars Spencer Tracy, Burt Lancaster, Richard Widmark, Maximilian Schell, Werner Klemperer, Marlene Dietrich, Judy Garland, William Shatner, and Montgomery Clift. It was released to very positive reviews on December 19, 1961. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1961 crime movies Category:1961 drama movies Category:1960s crime drama movies Category:1960s epic movies Category:1961 war movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies directed by Stanley Kramer Category:Movies about capital punishment Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in Bavaria
title: Judgment at Nuremberg
